article_metadata.author: Tom Taulli

og.description: Obamacare is likely to be a big tax headache for many entrepreneurs. But interestingly enough, the Internal Revenue Service is trying to help out – somewhat. To see, let’s take an example: Suppose that in late 2013, you enrolled in Obamacare and estimated your income would be $40,000 in 2014. Because of this, [...]
